dict.string: Build your foundation to achieve the benefits of QOT by watching the Performance Foundation videos in the Learn Section.
Learn about the Performance Habituation strategy, Creating Self-Image, in the Learn Section.
Write your personal To Be Vision by going to ME WHY in the Me Section.
Learn the 55 QOT Strategies to help you make your personal To Be Vision happen.
Add a sensor through the sidebar to learn more about your sleep and activity in the Me Section.
Go to the Prepare Section to prepare for your next key event by applying event-specific performance preparation protocols.
Tap on the top, right icon and link it to a calendar entry - you will see this checklist in the note section of your calendar event.
Tap on your QOT push notifications to stay you on track. You can review your message in the QOT Guide.
The Learn Section contains your QOT55 Strategies and your foundational QOT content.
The Me Section holds your To Be Vision, Weekly Choices, QOT Partners, and provides you with unique data about yourself and others like you.
TRACK YOUR DATA AND CREATE YOUR WHY
The Prepare Section allows your QOT Coach to help you prepare for your most important events.
The Guide Section helps you get ready for your day with your Daily Prep Minute, QOT Learning Plan, and push notifications.
Use the help section, sidebar, and main navigation to explore QOT.
